column4: I was wondering if there are any programs for ubuntu that i can see all ips that connect to me and disconnect from them if needed, I want to use to kick people from my game whenever some1 hacked joins it.   TY!
do you mean connect to the pc itself?
if you are the server you can kick whom you wish, its built into the game
the backup is encrypted using ecryptfs...
ok having a backup is good.
this is why encrypted filesystems suck and I personally don't advise them. Too much heartache and effort
sure, use the link I gave
then make your username so you can su to it
You don't get it, I don't have my old installation, just the encrypted files from my old home directory, I am logged in as my new username.
then make a username the same as your old username and you should be ok, surely?
can you pastebin the command and all outpuuted text, thanks
can just install lxde, the apps installed will run fine in XFCE ;)
converting from a lossy format to another lossy format will reduce quality
do they make events in xev?
in keyboard settings, click on the volume up entry then press your shortcut
